tripleplay.ui

Class Icons.Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.ui.Icons.Preloaded
      • tripleplay.ui.Icons.Loader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Icon
    Enclosing class:
    Icons

    public static class Icons.Loader
extends Icons.Preloaded
    An icon that supports asynchronous images.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Icons.Loader

        public Icons.Loader(Image image,
            float width,
            float height)
        Creates a new icon with the given image and dimensions. The image dimensions are ignored. If the image is not yet loaded at render time, a blank layer will be returned that will be automatically updated once the image is loaded.

      • render

        public Layer render()
        Description copied from interface: Icon
        Creates a new layer for displaying this icon. The caller is takes ownership of the new layer and is responsible for its destruction.
